channel.title: Static Websites on Imageless Thought
channel.description: Recent content in Static Websites on Imageless Thought

item.title: Jekyll: Static Webpages
item.description: Jekyll is a free and open source static site generator that was developed by Github and is written in the Ruby Programming Lanaguage. It takes text written in Markdown, Liquid, HTML & CSS and uses standardized layouts to create static webpages. SASS: Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets integration is bulit-in. You can easily customize the look and feel, URLs, and the data displayed on your pages.
